Package net.neoforged.neoforge.registries

Class DeferredItem<T extends Item>

java.lang.Object
net.neoforged.neoforge.registries.DeferredHolder<Item,T>
net.neoforged.neoforge.registries.DeferredItem<T>
Type Parameters:
T - The specific Item type.
All Implemented Interfaces:
Supplier<T>, Holder<Item>, ItemLike, IWithData<Item>
Direct Known Subclasses:
DeferredItemBuilder
public class DeferredItem<T extends Item> extends DeferredHolder<Item,T> implements ItemLike
Special DeferredHolder for Items that implements ItemLike.
